item.description:
Our March Meeting will have guest Speaker James Gage. James will teach us about Short Sales and How to Negotiate effectively and for larger profits.
James is very active in the Real Estate industry, holds an Accounting Degree, was a federal and state Arbitrator for over 15 years, federal and State Negotiator, Arbitrator for US Congressmen, Licensed Real Estate Agent, Financial and Estate Planner and author of the Lease Purchase Gazette, Arbitration Times, Success in Sight, What you weren't taught in School, and Never Lose Money in the Stock Market Again.

You will not want to miss this opportunity to see James speak. Remember to RSVP because the seats will fill up fast, and once the room is full- that's it!

To read James' full bio, visit the "files" link for Metro West Investors on the meetup site.

See you all March 6th!


Search for properties online at [url=http://www.ListRightRealEstate.com]http://ListRight... Real Estate

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Metro West Investors. Real Estate Group March Meetup
